title: Joe's Men's Brixton Straight and Narrow Leg Jean
description: FASHIONABLE JEANS FOR MEN: Make a statement without sacrificing comfort with our Brixton men’s jeans. Stylish and made from high-quality materials, these straight-fit jeans for men are ideal for dressing up or keeping it casual.

THE RIGHT FIT: This jean for men combines great looks with a great fit. Featuring a mid-rise waist with a straight modern fit from the hip, these pants have a tailored narrow leg and a bit of stretch for a trendy, straight leg profile.

ELEVATED STYLE & QUALITY: These modern straight jeans are made from a high-quality cotton-and-spandex-blend fabric. Each jean wash features edgy flat whiskers and hand sanding with expert contrast stitching and brass hardware to complete the look.

EASY CARE: A timeless cut and high-quality materials make these fashionable slim jeans for men a go-to wardrobe staple and a long-lasting investment in style. Simply machine wash the jeans to keep them looking their best with any outfit.

BE AUTHENTIC: Founded in 2001 with inherent L.A. sensibility and a rock-n-roll point of view, Joe’s Jeans redefines everyday style with jeans that combine the perfect fit, comfort, and quality with timeless and trendy good looks.

The Men’s Brixton Straight and Narrow Jean combines looks and comfort that can go from a casual day with friends to a night out on the town. These jeans create a confident look for those who want to make a statement without sacrificing comfort.
